title: God Calls Gideon
summary: Judges 6 begins with Israel oppressed by the Midianites. God calls Gideon, a hesitant and humble man, to be the next deliverer. Gideon asks for signs—including the famous fleece test—to confirm God’s call.

faq.question: Why was Israel suffering under Midian?
faq.answer: Because they did evil in the eyes of the Lord and turned to false gods.

faq.question: What sign did Gideon ask for?
faq.answer: He used a fleece to test God's will—first asking for it to be wet and the ground dry, then the reverse.
